an8.46:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava kosambiyam viharati ghositarame.
an8.46:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma anuruddho divaviharam gato hoti patisallino.
an8.46:1.3: Atha kho sambahula manapakayika devata yenayasma anuruddho tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva ayasmantam anuruddham abhivadetva ekamantam atthamsu. Ekamantam thita kho ta devata ayasmantam anuruddham etadavocum:
an8.46:1.4: “mayam, bhante anuruddha, manapakayika nama devata tisu thanesu issariyam karema vasam vattema.
an8.46:1.5: Mayam, bhante anuruddha, yadisakam vannam akankhama tadisakam vannam thanaso patilabhama;
an8.46:1.6: yadisakam saram akankhama tadisakam saram thanaso patilabhama;
an8.46:1.7: yadisakam sukham akankhama tadisakam sukham thanaso patilabhama.
an8.46:1.8: Mayam, bhante anuruddha, manapakayika nama devata imesu tisu thanesu issariyam karema vasam vattema”ti.
an8.46:2.2: “aho vatima devata sabbava nila assu nilavanna nilavattha nilalankara”ti.
an8.46:2.3: Atha kho ta devata ayasmato anuruddhassa cittamannaya sabbava nila ahesum nilavanna nilavattha nilalankara.
an8.46:3.4: sabbava odata assu odatavanna odatavattha odatalankara”ti.
an8.46:3.5: Atha kho ta devata ayasmato anuruddhassa cittamannaya sabbava odata ahesum odatavanna odatavattha odatalankara.
an8.46:4.1: Atha kho ta devata eka ca gayi eka ca nacci eka ca accharam vadesi.
an8.46:4.2: Seyyathapi nama pancangikassa turiyassa suvinitassa suppatipatalitassa kusalehi susamannahatassa saddo hoti vaggu ca rajaniyo ca kamaniyo ca pemaniyo ca madaniyo ca;
an8.46:4.3: evamevam tasam devatanam alankaranam saddo hoti vaggu ca rajaniyo ca kamaniyo ca pemaniyo ca madaniyo ca.
an8.46:4.4: Atha kho ayasma anuruddho indriyani okkhipi.
an8.46:5.1: Atha kho ta devata “na khvayyo anuruddho sadiyati”ti tatthevantaradhayimsu.
an8.46:5.2: Atha kho ayasma anuruddho sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anuruddho bhagavantam etadavoca:
an8.46:6.2: Atha kho, bhante, sambahula manapakayika devata yenaham tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva mam abhivadetva ekamantam atthamsu. Ekamantam thita kho, bhante, ta devata mam etadavocum:
an8.46:6.3: ‘mayam, bhante anuruddha, manapakayika nama devata tisu thanesu issariyam karema vasam vattema.
an8.46:6.4: Mayam, bhante anuruddha, yadisakam vannam akankhama tadisakam vannam thanaso patilabhama;
an8.46:6.5: yadisakam saram akankhama tadisakam saram thanaso patilabhama;
an8.46:6.6: yadisakam sukham akankhama tadisakam sukham thanaso patilabhama.
an8.46:6.7: Mayam, bhante anuruddha, manapakayika nama devata imesu tisu thanesu issariyam karema vasam vattema’ti.
an8.46:6.9: ‘aho vatima devata sabbava nila assu nilavanna nilavattha nilalankara’ti.
an8.46:6.10: Atha kho, bhante, ta devata mama cittamannaya sabbava nila ahesum nilavanna nilavattha nilalankara.
an8.46:7.4: sabbava odata assu odatavanna odatavattha odatalankara’ti.
an8.46:7.5: Atha kho, bhante, ta devata mama cittamannaya sabbava odata ahesum odatavanna odatavattha odatalankara.
an8.46:8.1: Atha kho, bhante, ta devata eka ca gayi eka ca nacci eka ca accharam vadesi.
an8.46:8.2: Seyyathapi nama pancangikassa turiyassa suvinitassa suppatipatalitassa kusalehi susamannahatassa saddo hoti vaggu ca rajaniyo ca kamaniyo ca pemaniyo ca madaniyo ca;
an8.46:8.3: evamevam tasam devatanam alankaranam saddo hoti vaggu ca rajaniyo ca kamaniyo ca pemaniyo ca madaniyo ca.
an8.46:9.1: Atha kho, bhante, ta devata ‘na khvayyo anuruddho sadiyati’ti tatthevantaradhayimsu.
an8.46:9.2: Katihi nu kho, bhante, dhammehi samannagato matugamo kayassa bheda param marana manapakayikanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati”ti?
an8.46:10.1: “Atthahi kho, anuruddha, dhammehi samannagato matugamo kayassa bheda param marana manapakayikanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati.
an8.46:10.3: Idha, anuruddha, matugamo yassa matapitaro bhattuno denti atthakama hitesino anukampaka anukampam upadaya tassa hoti pubbutthayini pacchanipatini kinkarapatissavini manapacarini piyavadini.
an8.46:11.2: matati va pitati va samanabrahmanati va—
an8.46:11.3: te sakkaroti, garum karoti, maneti, pujeti, abbhagate ca asanodakena patipujeti.
an8.46:12.1: Ye te bhattu abbhantara kammanta—unnati va kappasati va—tattha dakkha hoti analasa tatrupayaya vimamsaya samannagata alam katum alam samvidhatum.
an8.46:13.1: Yo so bhattu abbhantaro antojano—dasati va pessati va kammakarati va—
an8.46:13.2: tesam katanca katato janati akatanca akatato janati, gilanakananca balabalam janati khadaniyam bhojaniyancassa paccamsena samvibhajati.
an8.46:14.1: Yam bhattu aharati dhanam va dhannam va jatarupam va tam arakkhena guttiya sampadeti, tattha ca hoti adhutti atheni asondi avinasika.
an8.46:15.1: Upasika kho pana hoti buddham saranam gata dhammam saranam gata sangham saranam gata.
an8.46:16.2: panatipata pativirata, adinnadana pativirata, kamesumicchacara pativirata, musavada pativirata, suramerayamajjapamadatthana pativirata.
an8.46:17.2: Vigatamalamaccherena cetasa agaram ajjhavasati muttacaga payatapanini vossaggarata yacayoga danasamvibhagarata.
an8.46:18.1: Imehi kho, anuruddha, atthahi dhammehi samannagato matugamo kayassa bheda param marana manapakayikanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjatiti.
